entry.title: Check Out Our Tutorial On YouTube!
entry.summary: If the default set of customization options of the stories in our library is not enough for you, you can write your own custom stories with our state-of-the-art parser and upload them to your own private library. If you follow the simple instructions and tutorial, our software will allow you to make pronouns, characters, locations -- and more -- customizable within the app as well. This will be a great opportunity to create fun memories with your children!
entry.content:
If the default set of customization options of the stories in our library is not enough for you, you can write your own custom stories with our state-of-the-art parser and upload them to your own private library. If you follow the simple instructions and tutorial, our software will allow you to make pronouns, characters, locations -- and more -- customizable within the app as well. This will be a great opportunity to create fun memories with your children!

I also invite you to watch the demo of the mobile app.

Download on iOS test flight and Google Play.

  • https://testflight.apple.com/join/OGNZivve
  • https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TheReadingClub.TheReadingClub
